synopsis: The three shorts in the anthology are titled "Hidamari no Chōshoku" (Sunny Breakfast), "Chiisana Fashion Show" (A Small Fashion Show), and "Shanghai Koi" (Shanghai Love), and all three will be set in three different Chinese cities.The theme of the three stories are food, clothing, and shelter. "Hidamari no Chōshoku," which is about a youth working in Beijing and a grandmother in his hometown. "Chiisana Fashion Show," which is about sisters living in Guangzhou. "Shanghai Koi," which is set in 1990s Shanghai.
